website_summaries.verdict: Made from garden-fresh seeds, grains, and fruits; the fragrant orange oil will grab your cockatoo's or cockatiel’s attention, and its appetizingly wholesome ingredients will keep them coming back for more.
pros: Millet, safflower seed, canary seed, oats, buckwheat, and sunflower seed are the first 6 ingredients
Flavorful pieces like papaya, peppers, and coconut
cons: This isn’t a complete diet, so supplement it with fruits and treats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly feed my birds a pellet diet, but I love having fresh seed on hand to spice things up a bit. I have a parrotlet and a green cheeked conure who both adore this mix. It is always gobbled up when offered. The seed is always fresh and clean smelling; almost like something I would want to eat myself. The 2lb bag is just enough for me to keep on hand for 3-4 months without worrying about spoilage. I have had no issues with bugs. Overall a great quality product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan W

customer_reviews.title: My bird likes it
customer_reviews.text: I like that the Volkman seed is specially formulated for cockatiels and easy to order online
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Good basic mix for 'tiels....
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, basic cockatiel seed mix. I feed high quality pellets in addition to seed mix and it is hard to find seed mixes these days that do not have a bunch of filler in the form of cheap pellets and other junk my bird won't eat and therefor throws on the floor and wastes. There is very little waste with this product, my bird loves it. It could really do without the peanuts but other then that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: CAfarmgirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cockatiels love it!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other seed blends, this product has very little waste. My birds don't eat the peanuts but I leave them for the outside birds who gobble them lup!
customer_reviews.author: Gambels Quail

customer_reviews.title: I would have given a 5 star rating, but
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 star rating for this product but I didn't realize that this was a 2lb bag instead of the 4lb bag I usually get from Chewy.com for the same price as I paid for this 2lb bag. Chewy was out of this brand of seed for my birds to I tenatively bought it from here. I'm going back to Chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Leokadia Seto

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with our birds
customer_reviews.text: Both our cockatiel and conure go crazy for this mix. It’s a huge hit - so much so that our cockatiel sings for it.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Izzy the cockatiel, now going on ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Izzy the cockatiel, now going on his 19th year, loves the stuff
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good-quality seed
customer_reviews.text: My go-to seed. Four stars because it's much less expensive elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: bunnysaver

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey.But  for my uppity lovebird seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: I have a new lovebird he seems to be very picky about his food.He or she really loves this food
customer_reviews.author: dwp

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: What I got was not what was shown on main page and doesn't have the greens shown either. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shadia Bernadette Riziq

customer_reviews.title: Great seed
customer_reviews.text: My cockatiel has been on this diet since a baby and does very well. This seed is always fresh and healthy and he gobbles it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kani Gogi Wayah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too many safflower seeds which my cockatiel ignores. You need to find a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Maheu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected which is why I ordered it. Right product at right price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy seed
customer_reviews.text: Good value for fresh, natural, healthy seeds. No colors, additives, or extras. My bird enjoys it & even her feathers look healthier, shinier. The only issue I find is that the zipper of the bag doesn't close, so I keep it in another ziplock bags & refrigerate for freshness.
customer_reviews.author: CDP4201974

product_meta.title: Volkman Seed Avian Science Super Cockatiel No Sunflower 2lb
product_meta.description: Complete diet seed mix with no sunflower seeds for all small parrots. California seeds made in the USA
feature_bullets: Clean seed blend for all Cockatiels, Lovebirds, Quakers, small Conures
Clean mix with very little dust
All natural, No artificial colors, additives or preservatives
No pellets, fillers, or grit added, just clean, fresh seeds
